snippet: The chief of SurveyMonkey, who was married to Sheryl Sandberg of Facebook, collapsed while exercising at a Mexican resort, according to a government official.
abstract: Mexican official says SurveyMonkey chief executive Dave Goldberg died of head trauma suffered in fall at resort gym in Mexico; he was husband of Facebook executive Sheryl K Sandberg.

byline.original: By VINDU GOEL and RANDAL C. ARCHIBOLD
byline.contributor: Vindu Goel reported from San Francisco and Randal C. Archibold from Mexico City. Paulina Villegas contributed reporting from Mexico City and Jodi Kantor from New York.

lead_paragraph: The chief of SurveyMonkey, who was married to Sheryl Sandberg of Facebook, collapsed while exercising at a Mexican resort, according to a government official.

headline.main: Dave Goldberg, Silicon Valley Executive, Died of Head Trauma, Mexican Official Says
headline.print_headline: Official Says Goldberg Died After Fall at Mexican Resort
